features: SafePulse proven to maximize visibility by aiding in a driver's depth perception in order to safely locate and avoid cyclist
Smart sensor technology senses motion and turns Vya on when inserted into mount
Auto-off when bike is parked or light is removed from mount
Exclusive overmolding technology with bio-renewable material
Waterproof to 1 meter (when inserted in mount) for all-conditions reliability (IP67 Rated)
USB Mount Receptor allows light to be mounted and removed from bike in seconds with a simple, secure 1/4 turn lock
Innovative amber side lighting for increased visibility at intersections
Direct USB Charging Without Cables (Fully charges in 2 hours)
Backed by Light & Motion’s 2 Year Warranty and Enhanced Experience Guarantee.
